entry.name: bounce
entry.title: Bounce Effect
entry.desc: The bounce effect bounces an element. When used with hide or show, the last or first bounce will also fade in/out.

dl.dd: Hides the element by pulling a bouncing out the direction and fading out on the last half bounce
Shows the element by pulling a bouncing in from the direction fading in on the the first half bounce.
Will use hide or show depending on the current visibility of the element
Just bounces the element, doesn't hide or show.

desc.p: The direction the blind will be pulled to "hide" the element., or the direction from which the element will be revealed.

option.name: distance
option.desc: The distance of the largest "bounce" in pixels

option.name: times
option.desc: The number of times the element will bounce. When used with hide or show, there is an extra "half" bounce for the fade in/out

example.html: Click anywhere to toggle the silver box.
